name: Dice King - Be Board Master
description:
Roll the dice and build a board city! Play Dice King know.

-Roll the dice and build your city.
-Enjoy the beautiful sea city.
-Many things in dice king wait for you, angels, cops, quiz, puzzles.
-Steal is can be possible in Dice King.
-A lot of city wait you to build.
-Amazing art effects.

There are brove board games, do you want play Dice King - Be Board Master.
